archimate:Principle.name: Clarity and simplicity
archimate:Principle.documentation:
Solutions and services must be compliant to applicable laws and regulations. ​
All activities must adhere to internally set policies and standards set by the authorized Tietoevry Tech Services and Tietoevry Group governing bodies. ​
Solutions, services, and designs must comply to Tietoevry Tech Services and Tietoevry Group defined standards and frameworks. ​
If applicable Tietoevry Tech Services and Tietoevry Group framework is not explicitly defined, industry standard, open frameworks and best practices are preferred over proprietary standards and frameworks. ​
